overview: My, my, my, these girls are plus-sized and beautiful. Their breasts can hardly be contained by their clothing. In fact, it's nearly impossible. The thin fabric bulges against the weight. They're thick in the waist and everywhere else. They love sex. They have a healthy appetite for it, and it doesn't matter the setting - even a work environment isn't safe from their carnal moods!
title: Thick Chicks
